text: The Great Ziegfeld is a 1936 American musical drama movie directed by Robert Z. Leonard and starring William Powell, Myrna Loy, Luise Rainer, Frank Morgan, Fanny Brice, Virginia Bruce, Reginald Owen, Ray Bolger, Harriet Hoctor. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and was nominated for 7 Oscars and won 3 Academy Awards in 1937. It was followed up by Ziegfeld Girl in 1941 and Ziegfeld Follies in 1946. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1936 drama movies Category:1930s American musical movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Z. Leonard
title: The Great Ziegfeld
